mdRecord.dcterms:title: Voting precincts: Journal supplement / drawn, engraved & printed by Hart & Mapother, Louisville, Ky
Journal supplement
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hart & Mapother. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows precinct boundaries and numbers, ward numbers and voting places. Includes textual description of the boundaries of the wards. [original]
Distances from the Court House and from Main Street are recorded in lower and right margins. [original]
Oriented with north toward the upper left. [original]
Hart & Mapother were lithographers, engravers, job printers, and civil engineers at Louisville from 1855 to 1870. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Linen backed. Gift of Bernard Shipp. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Election districts--Kentucky--Louisville--Maps
Louisville (Ky.)--Maps
